review: This Fire TV Stick is such a great value!  We mostly bought it because we didn't like using an outdated Wii for the sole purpose of Netflix.  The Fire TV Stick took less than 5 minutes to set up, was super inexpensive, and we haven't had a single problem.  We use Netflix, Pandora, and Plex constantly and other features less frequently.  Also, we have small children who are (heaven help them) always "misplacing" our remotes.  For this reason, we set up the Fire TV remote apps on both our phones and we never have to spend time looking around for the remote because we can always use our phones just as easily.  This is an amazing product.
